verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> Many a time <S%H7227><s%> have they afflicted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%> may Israel <S%H3478><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> say: <S%H559><s%>
Many a time <S%H7227><s%> have they afflicted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> they have not <S%H3808><s%> prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against me.
The plowers <S%H2790><s%> plowed <S%H2790><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my back: <S%H1354><s%> they made long <S%H748><s%> their furrows. <S%H4618><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous: <S%H6662><s%> he hath cut asunder <S%H7112><s%> the cords <S%H5688><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Let them all <S%H3605><s%> be confounded <S%H954><s%> and turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> that hate <S%H8130><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
Let them be <S%H1961><s%> as the grass <S%H2682><s%> upon the housetops, <S%H1406><s%> which withereth <S%H3001><s%> before <S%H7945><s%> <S%H6927><s%> it groweth up: <S%H8025><s%>
Wherewith the mower <S%H7114><s%> filleth <S%H4390><s%> not <S%H7945><s%> <S%H3808><s%> his hand; <S%H3709><s%> nor he that bindeth <S%H6014><s%> sheaves his bosom. <S%H2683><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> do they which go by <S%H5674><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be upon <S%H413><s%> you: we bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
